mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( userId, name, password, nickName, email, birthYY, birthMM, birthDD, activityArea, phone, personalGender ) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{birthYY}, #{birthMM}, #{birthDD}, #{activityArea}, #{phone}, #{personalGender} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET password = #{password}, nickName = #{nickName}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone} WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.userId, m.name, m.password, m.nickName, m.email, m.birthYY, m.birthMM, m.birthDD, m.activityArea, m.phone, m.personalGender, m.auth, p.profileImage_file profileImg FROM member m LEFT JOIN profileImage p ON m.userId = p.member_userId WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT m.userId, m.nickName, a.ab_number, a.ab_category, a.ab_title, a.ab_insertDatetime, a.ab_viewCount FROM member m LEFT JOIN academyBoard a ON m.userId = a.member_userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY a.ab_number DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{records}

SELECT m.userId, m.nickName, f.fb_number, f.fb_category, f.fb_title, f.fb_insertDatetime, f.fb_viewCount FROM member m LEFT JOIN freeBoard f ON m.userId = f.member_userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY f.fb_number DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{records}

SELECT m.userId, m.nickName, b.bookId, b.title, b.matchType, b.level, b.status, b.bookDate, b.bookTime, b.teamGender, b.location_locationId, l.stadiumName FROM member m LEFT JOIN book b ON m.userId = b.member_userId LEFT JOIN location l ON b.location_locationId = l.locationId WHERE m.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY b.bookId DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{records}
SELECT Count(*) FROM member m LEFT JOIN book b ON m.userId = b.member_userId LEFT JOIN location l ON b.location_locationId = l.locationId WHERE m.userId = #{userId}
SELECT m.userId, m.nickName, fr.freeBoard_fb_number, fr.fb_replyContent, fr.fb_insertDatetime FROM member m LEFT JOIN freeBoardReply fr ON m.userId = fr.member_userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId}

SELECT m.userId, m.nickName, ar.academyBoard_ab_number, ar.ab_replyContent, ar.ab_replyInsertDatetime FROM member m LEFT JOIN academyBoardReply ar ON m.userId = ar.member_userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId}
SELECT m.userId, m.nickName, br.book_bookId, br.replyContent, br.insertDatetime FROM member m LEFT JOIN bookReply br ON m.userId = br.member_userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId}

SELECT m.userId, m.nickName, (SELECT a.ab_number FROM academyBoard a WHERE academyBoard_ab_number = a.ab_number) ab_number, (SELECT a.ab_title FROM academyBoard a WHERE academyBoard_ab_number = a.ab_number) ab_title, (SELECT a.ab_insertDatetime FROM academyBoard a WHERE academyBoard_ab_number = a.ab_number) ab_insertDatetime FROM member m LEFT JOIN academyBoardLike al ON m.userId = al.member_userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId};

SELECT m.userId, m.nickName, (SELECT f.fb_number FROM freeBoard f WHERE freeBoard_fb_number = f.fb_number) fb_number, (SELECT f.fb_title FROM freeBoard f WHERE freeBoard_fb_number = f.fb_number) fb_title, (SELECT f.fb_insertDatetime FROM freeBoard f WHERE freeBoard_fb_number = f.fb_number) fb_insertDatetime FROM member m LEFT JOIN freeBoardLike fl ON m.userId = fl.member_userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId};
